channel.title: CVE Feed for fruitfulcode -- Fruitful
channel.description: The latest CVEs for fruitfulcode -- Fruitful

item.title: CVE-2020-36704|2024-08-04T17:37:06.297Z -- fruitfulcode -- fruitful
item.description: The Fruitful Theme for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via several parameters stored via the fruitful_theme_options_action AJAX action in versions up to, and including, 3.8.1 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level permissions and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
